title: Language Wars 2024: Python Leads, Java Maintains, Rust Rises
author: Darryl K Taft
description: In 2024, Python solidified its AI dominance, Java proved its enterprise staying power, and Rust gained ground in memory-safe programming, marking a transformative year for three of the world's leading programming languages.
cntitle: 编程语言大战2024：Python领跑，Java保持稳定，Rust崛起
cndescription: 2024年，Python巩固了其在AI领域的统治地位，Java证明了其在企业领域的持久影响力，而Rust在内存安全编程方面也取得了进展，这标志着全球三大领先编程语言具有变革性的一年。
